original_title: Wade in the Water: A Journey into Black Surfing and Aquatic Culture
overview: Wade in the Water: A Journey into Black Surfing and Aquatic Culture (2023) reclaims the 1,000-year-old tradition of Black surfing. Braiding historical accounts with modern-day testimonials, the film dismantles the racial barriers of conventional surf culture, delves into the overlooked history of Black surfing's legacy, and honors its current movementâ€”inspiring the next generation of Black surfers.
title: Wade in the Water: A Journey into Black Surfing and Aquatic Culture
